Name: Co Vien Lau (Ancient Vietnamese Village)
Location: Tam Coc - Bich Dong, Ninh Binh
Area: Ninh Hai commune, Hoa Lu district
Address: Tam Coc - Bich Dong tourist area, Ninh Binh
Status: Desolate and poorly maintained; fading from tourists' hearts
Cultural Value: Famous for its peaceful northern Vietnamese countryside scenery and as a former film studio and tourist attraction

Name: Thanh Liem Communal House
Cultural Value: Unique architectural style with carved patterns; historically important in local rituals

Name: Trang An Eco-tourism Area
Location: Trang An World Heritage Complex, Ninh Binh
Status: Recognized by UNESCO as a dual World Heritage site
Cultural Value: A rich ecosystem with flooded forests, limestone mountains, and archaeological sites

Name: Hoa Lu Ancient Capital
Cultural Value: The capital of Vietnam from 968-1010, linked to the Dinh, Tien Le, and Ly dynasties

Name: Xam Singing
Cultural Value: A traditional Vietnamese folk song, significant for cultural heritage and preservation efforts
